text: The 2017 Annapolis mayoral election was held November 7, 2017 in Annapolis, Maryland. Mike Pantelides, the incumbent mayor, ran for a second term as Mayor. Democratic nominee Gavin Buckley won the election with 61.06% of the vote, becoming the city's next mayor.http://www.capitalgazette.com/news/elections/ac-cn-annapolis-election- day-1108-story.html ==Results== ==References== Annapolis Annapolis Annapolis Category:Mayoral elections in Annapolis, Maryland
title: 2017 Annapolis mayoral election
